titles.title: MORE WATER Act
Making Our communities Resilient through Enhancing Water for Agriculture, Technology, the Environment, and Residences Act
MORE WATER Act

A bill to amend the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act to reauthorize the large-scale water recycling and reuse program, to establish a Water Conveyance Improvement Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
